content.rendered:
Dust Control Signs

 

 

Posterhead sells dust control signs / dust permit signs for the Las Vegas, Clark County, Henderson, North Las Vegas areas. These dust control or dust permit signs are made with tough double sided aluminum panels that contain a substrate between the two outer aluminum panels to maintain structural integrity. These tough aluminum panels can withstand the harsh environment that Clark County offers and are superior to the old wood dust control signs.

Posterhead offers the 4ft x 4ft dust control / dust permit sign for $99 and the larger 4ft x 8ft dust control sign for $175.00. For additional requirements for your dust control needs, Clark County has a website.

Basically, for construction projects 10 acres or less, a 4ft x 4ft sign is required and for project greater than 10 acres, a 4ft x 8ft dust permit sign is needed.

Posterhead Signs can assist you in all of your construction sign needs.  Posterhead sells NO TRESPASSING SIGNS, DUMPSTER SIGNS, SAFETY SIGNS and a whole lot more, including large mesh banners for surrounding fences at very reasonable prices.

Getting a dust permit sign is easy. Simply email Posterhead Signs @   posterheadsigns@yahoo.com and forward us your Air Quality Dust Permit and we will take the necessary information of the form and transfer it to your custom dust control sign.

Contact Posterhead today for your free quote on construction signs.
